ygData.subject: Re: Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: mantles are WAY harder than coifs, they should be 3-5pp more than coifs tuincs are harder than mantles and should be about 25-30pp I am 102 skill and my cost
ygData.messageBody:
mantles are WAY harder than coifs, they should be 3-5pp more than coifs
tuincs are harder than mantles and should be about 25-30pp

I am 102 skill and my cost to make a mantle was 18pp and i sold it for that
cuz i had already set the price

I also tried to make legs at that skill and never made one wasting 24 plat

At 07:56 AM 5/13/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Joe Blow" <freshjive@...>
>
>>> What is everyone selling banded for (compiling list)
>>
>Prices I've seen for banded
>Bracers 5-6pp each
>Mask 8-10pp
>Tunic 15-25pp
>Sleeves 10-20pp
>Pants 10-35pp....I got lucky and bought mine for 10.
>Boots 10pp
>Coif 15-20pp
>Mantle 10-15pp
>
>>On that note, what is everyone selling patchwork for as well?
>
> It depends where you are. In the north by everfrost where pelts of all
sizes are quite abundant generally 2gp per piece. On Faydwer in Greater
Faydark it usually goes for 3gp a piece. I've sold a few pieces there for
4gp.
>
> Good luck
>
>Grimmlokk the happy warrior of E'ci
